Name: Team Velocity
Description: Maximize average story points completed per sprint

Name: Defect Count
Description: Minimize number of unresolved bugs at the end of each sprint

Name: Stakeholder Satisfaction
Description: Maximize average satisfaction rating from stakeholders

Name: Test Coverage
Description: Maximize percentage of code covered by automated tests

Name: Time-to-Market
Description: Minimize days from project start to first release

Name: Budget Variance
Description: Minimize deviation between actual cost and budget

Name: Feature Throughput
Description: Maximize number of features delivered per sprint

Name: Team Satisfaction
Description: Maximize team satisfaction score from retrospectives

Name: Estimation Accuracy
Description: Maximize ratio of estimated to actual effort

Name: Release Adherence
Description: Maximize percentage of planned features delivered on schedule
